title: Matching between ctlinical examination and dermoscopy in patients with nail psoriasis: Should dermoscopy be used instead of clinical examination?
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Kaveh Gharaei Nejad, Hojat Eftekhari, Rana Rafiei, Abbas Darjani, Narges Alizadeh, Reyhaneh Ghadarjani, Katayoun Dadgostar
